PAD_TeleportedFromUnderdarkToSwamp.synopsis: The player stepped into the mushroom ring in the Underdark and was teleported to the area outside the Hag's house.

PAD_TeleportedFromHagToSwamp.synopsis: The player stepped into the mushroom ring in the Hag's Lair and was teleported to the area outside the Hag's house, in the swamp.

PAD_TeleportedToUnderdark.synopsis: The player stepped into the mushroom ring in the Hag's Lair and was teleported to the Underdark.

PAD_FellDown.synopsis: Character just discovered that some mushroom platforms are magical - they disappear if you step on them. The voicebark can happen after the character fell from a platform or after the character succussfully jumped from the platform before it disappeared, so the text should be about the platforms being illusory, not about falling down.

PAD_InactiveFairyRingEntered.synopsis: The player steps into a mushroom ring, but nothing happens (it is inactive at the moment).

PAD_TeleportedFromSwampToHag.synopsis: The player stepped into the mushroom ring in the Swamp and was teleported to the Hag's Lair.

PAD_TeleportedFromUnderdarkToHag.synopsis: The player stepped into the mushroom ring in the Underdark and was teleported to the Hag's Lair.

PAD_NewColorComment.synopsis: The player activated the Hag Fairy Ring system and now the rings in the Underdark and Swamp have new colors.

PAD_InactiveFairyRingApproached.synopsis: The player approaches a ring made of mushrooms.

PAD_MedicineCheck.synopsis: The player tries to figure out why a drow died beneath a mushroom ledge in the Underdark. Result appears with a successful passive Medicine check.

PAD_TeleportedFromUnderdarkToSwamp_0.speaker: Player
PAD_TeleportedFromUnderdarkToSwamp_0.text: From the dark to the... damp. An improvement, either way.

PAD_TeleportedFromUnderdarkToSwamp_1.speaker: Player
PAD_TeleportedFromUnderdarkToSwamp_1.text: From the Underdark to the swamp. Lovely.

PAD_TeleportedFromHagToSwamp_0.speaker: Player
PAD_TeleportedFromHagToSwamp_0.text: I'd say the swamp is a breath of fresh air compared to the hag, but... not really.

PAD_TeleportedToUnderdark_0.speaker: Player
PAD_TeleportedToUnderdark_0.text: Teleported right into the Underdark. Lovely.

PAD_TeleportedToUnderdark_1.speaker: Player
PAD_TeleportedToUnderdark_1.text: Is this the Underdark? Gods take me.

PAD_FellDown_0.speaker: Player
PAD_FellDown_0.text: Damn. Some of these mushrooms are illusions.

PAD_InactiveFairyRingEntered_0.speaker: Player
PAD_InactiveFairyRingEntered_0.text: Pretty, but it doesn't do much.

PAD_InactiveFairyRingEntered_1.speaker: Player
PAD_InactiveFairyRingEntered_1.text: I wonder why this one isn't working.

PAD_TeleportedFromSwampToHag_0.speaker: Player
PAD_TeleportedFromSwampToHag_0.text: Looks like the hag made a shortcut. Clever.

PAD_TeleportedFromSwampToHag_1.speaker: Player
PAD_TeleportedFromSwampToHag_1.text: The hag's lair? I think I preferred the swamp.

PAD_TeleportedFromUnderdarkToHag_0.speaker: Player
PAD_TeleportedFromUnderdarkToHag_0.text: From the Underdark to a hag's lair? Like jumping from a pot into boiling oil.

PAD_TeleportedFromUnderdarkToHag_1.speaker: Player
PAD_TeleportedFromUnderdarkToHag_1.text: Back in the hag's lair. Good thing she's dead.

PAD_NewColorComment_0.speaker: Player
PAD_NewColorComment_0.text: The ring changed colour. I wonder why.

PAD_InactiveFairyRingApproached_0.speaker: Player
PAD_InactiveFairyRingApproached_0.text: A perfect ring of mushrooms. Nature or magic?

PAD_InactiveFairyRingApproached_1.speaker: Player
PAD_InactiveFairyRingApproached_1.text: Hm. This fairy ring isn't glowing like the rest.

PAD_MedicineCheck_0.speaker: Player
PAD_MedicineCheck_0.text: Half this drow's body is crushed. Must have fallen from pretty high up.

PAD_MedicineCheck_1.speaker: Player
PAD_MedicineCheck_1.text: Dead drow and some skeletons. I wonder what happened.
